thread.title: DC Download: Affordable Tesla's and Fantasy Sports Lobbying
thread.title_full: DC Download: Affordable Tesla's and Fantasy Sports Lobbying

author: Eric Hal Schwartz
title: DC Download: Affordable Tesla's and Fantasy Sports Lobbying
text: share 50 on Fire Judges meetup tonight Wednesday evening will be our first 50 on Fire Meet the Judges Meetup at Johnny Pistoles. It will be a great chance to meet nominees and judges of the best and brightest around the district. See you tonight and be sure to check out some of the nominees who have already had their names submitted. When can you actually afford to buy a Tesla? Anticipation over the Tesla Model 3, which will be enormously cheaper than previous models, is already rising two years ahead of when Elon Musk says it will arrive. But will it actually come out when he says even though none of the other models have? We took a look at how likely that really is and whether it will affect Tesla much one way or another . Tuesday's funding madness Two big fundings already this week as Baltimore-based Bambeco, creators of eco-friendly furniture e-commerece platform, and Bethesda-based business software developer RainKing Solutions, raised a combined $87 million. Read more about it in Chris Bing's funding roundup here . FanDuel drafts a hotshot lobbyist Fantasy sports giant FanDuel wants to make some new friends on Capitol Hill and drafted the perfect lobbyist for the job. Can he block Congress from tackling FanDuel before it reaches its IPO end zone? Find out in our full report here .
